actions.committee: House Committee on Banking and Currency
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Banking and Currency.

official_title: Joint resolution to extend through September 1973, the authority of the Secretary of Housing and Urban Development with respect to the insurance of loans and mortgages, and for other purposes.

summary.text: Extends to September 30, 1973, specified FHA insurance programs under the authority of the Secretary of Housing and Urban Development.

titles.title: Joint resolution to extend through September 1973, the authority of the Secretary of Housing and Urban Development with respect to the insurance of loans and mortgages, and for other purposes.
